attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pitch fees for Park Homes should be capped.  Residents who pay for all utilities and council tax in addition to Pitch fees should have their annual pitch fee capped as Government annual inflation figures, CPI is running at half the RPI which is the current method of increase for park homes. New Final salary pension increases are now capped at 2.5%.
